basic.description: This course examines a variety of substantive topics in the sociology of deviance. The choice of topics will illustrate the range of theoretical approaches discussed in SOCY 275/3.0. The selection of topics will vary from semester to semester but will typically include violence, corporate crime, sexual deviance, and physical stigma.
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Substantive Issues in Social Deviance

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    SOCY 275/3.0.
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from SOCY 274/6.0; SOCY 275/3.0; SOCY 276/3.0
